articles.title: Fans Wave Goodbye to the DCEU as Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom Plunges Into Theaters - IGN
articles.description: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom comes to theaters this Friday, so fans are taking this moment to reflect on the DC Extended Universe and what it could have been.
